channel.title: Making an npc spawn only when a certain npc spawns... like god wars
channel.description: Ok well on my server I am adding a godwars type of bosses. A main boss that is a high level and 3 other bosses that are not as strong and I want to make it so if when you kill all of the bosses they all spawn at the same time. Like if you were to kill the main boss then the other three minibosses after then when the main bosses spawn timer hits 0 they all spawn at the same time. I have been trying quite a few things but I can't seem to make it work right lol... Some help and hints would be appreciated ;)

item.title: Making an npc spawn only when a certain npc spawns... like god wars
item.dc:creator: @jeddac jeddac
item.description:
@jeddac wrote:

He’s saying,

You kill boss, time till respawn = 180 seconds
Then you start to kill the mini bosses, but you still have one left when the boss spawn timer runs out, then AS SOON AS the boss spawn timer runs out it spawns the boss and all 3 mini bosses, right?

Can’t help you though ;’(

Read full topic
item.source: Making an npc spawn only when a certain npc spawns... like god wars
